alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Clarke; Escambia; Mobile; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 11:29AM CST until December 30 at 12:15PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Southern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... South central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... Western Escambia County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 1215 PM CST. * At 1128 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles east of Deer Park to Prichard to Grand Bay, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Tillmans Corner, Fairhope, Saraland, Bay Minette, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Grand Bay, Robertsdale, Citronelle, Creola, Loxley, Chunchula, Stockton and McCullough. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
